alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 10:09AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, George and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for the Pascagoula At Merrill. * From late Friday night until further notice. * At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.0 feet. * Flood stage is 22.0 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to 23.0 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. * Impact...At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
